name: taskapp
description: TaskApp - Aplicação fullstack de gerenciamento de tarefas

scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run start" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.clean: node -e "require('fs').rmSync('node_modules', {recursive:true, force:true})" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('backend/node_modules', {recursive:true, force:true})" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('frontend/node_modules', {recursive:true, force:true})" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('backend/build', {recursive:true, force:true})" && node -e "require('fs').rmSync('frontend/dist', {recursive:true, force:true})"
scripts.deploy: npm run install:all && cd backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
